page.title: 01ENTERPRISE ZONE (ALNESS)
page.content: { The Enterprise Zone was set up in Oct 83 to create jobs and industries in the area.The Alness Sector is situated to the south of the town with direct links to the A9 trunk road.This section will be linked to a proposed by_pass.This sector includes an industrial estate already under development,and a program of advanced factory building is in progress.Some of the industries in this estate include "Tough Packaging LTD",a small firm with 5 employees.This firm manufactures printed and plain polythene bags,carrier bags,bin liners and refuse sacks.Another firm is "Mr Gripp LTD",a small firm consisting of 5 employees.This firm makes industrial Hand Cleaner.The Alness sector has already proved to be successful in attracting new industries to the area therefore creating new jobs.
